ttp_template:
<group name="as_path_loc_pref_metric_network">
BGP table vers{{ORIGIN | ORPHRASE}}on is 3, local router ID is 192.168.1.1
*> 1{{METRIC}}.{{WEIGHT}}.0.0/8  192.168.10.1  0  {{LOC_PREF | ORPHRASE}}  0 65001 i
*  10.0.0.0/8  192.168.20.1  0  100  0 {{AS_PATH | ORPHRASE}} i
*> {{NETWORK | ORPHRASE}}  192.168.10.2  0  100  0 65001 i
  172.16.0.0/12  {{NEXT_HOP | ORPHRASE}}  0  100  0 65002 i
</group>
cli_content:
BGP table version is 3, local router ID is 192.168.1.1
Status codes: s suppressed, d damped, h history, * valid, > best, i - internal, S Stale, R Removed
Origin codes: i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete

   Network          Next Hop        Metric LocPrf Weight Path
*> 10.0.0.0/8       192.168.10.1         0    100      0 65001 i
*  10.0.0.0/8       192.168.20.1         0    100      0 65002 i
*> 172.16.0.0/12    192.168.10.2         0    100      0 65001 i
   172.16.0.0/12    192.168.20.2         0    100      0 65002 i
*> 192.168.0.0/16   0.0.0.0              0         32768 i

Total number of prefixes 3
textfsm_template:
Value NETWORK (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+\/\d+)
Value NEXT_HOP (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value METRIC (\d+)
Value LOC_PREF (\d+)
Value WEIGHT (\d+)
Value AS_PATH ([0-9\ ]+)
Value ORIGIN (\w)

Start
  ^\s*Network\s+Next Hop\s+Metric\s+LocPrf\s+Weight\s+Path\s*$$
  ^\s*${NETWORK}\s+${NEXT_HOP}\s+${METRIC}\s+${LOC_PREF}\s+${WEIGHT}\s+${AS_PATH}\s+${ORIGIN}\s*$$ -> Record
